[MY PREVIOUS ACTION - Turn 90]
Reasoning: **The Shop: A Symphony of Optimization**

Okay, here we are, Ante 4, Round 7. Time to see what the shop has to offer. I've got $47, a pretty solid foundation. My Joker setup is where the real power lies, though. Let's see... Smiley Face, Photograph, Hanging Chad, Stuntman, and Pareidolia. This is a *beautiful* engine. Pareidolia means every card's a face card, Smiley Face adds +5 Mult for each, Photograph doubles the first face card, and Hanging Chad retriggers it *twice*. Each card will trigger the smiley, then photo, then chad, then again, then again, resulting in 8x on each card. It's like a machine! I've also got Stuntman giving me a nice chip boost, which is keeping me afloat.

I'm eyeing the shop cards, but nothing seems better than what I have. Acrobat is tempting, but X3 on the final hand isn't going to be better than what I have now, where it's mult on *every* hand. I am *very* reluctant to sell any of my jokers, since the current synergy is just too strong. Stuntman is the only one I'm even *slightly* considering, but +250 chips are crucial for me at this point. No need for the Tower, and Superposition isn't even worth it. The Overstock and Overstock Plus vouchers are good, but I don't really need them right now.

I've already re-arranged my Jokers (thanks to the last action) to ensure the triggers fire in the correct order, Smiley, Photo, Chad. So, I have: Smiley, Photo, Chad, Stuntman, and Pareidolia.

I have Justice (Glass) and The World (Spades) consumables, which are good. I can't use them here, though. That will have to wait for the round. The question is, should I use them? I'll hold onto them for now. I should save my money and proceed to the round selection.

Should I reroll? I could look for planets or a better Joker, but my money is better saved for interest and future higher-cost items.

I think I'm set. Let's make sure that's true by looking at the shop one last time. Nope. Looks like I'll save the money and proceed.

One last thing, since I'm leaving, should I use Justice or The World? I'll have to see when the blind is coming. No, I should hold them.

Final decision: `round_select`. Let's get to the next round!

Oh wait, one thing: the hand size from Stuntman is reduced. It makes things a little harder. Justice is a little risky since cards can break. The World is nice since it'll allow for the Flushes. Let's proceed.

Okay, now *really* time to move on.

My options are clear: I can play the round, skip the round, or use a consumable. Right now, I can't use Justice or The World, it's not the right time. Jokers are already optimally placed - Smiley Face before Photograph.

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
